summary: This is a forwarded email from August 26, 2019, discussing a New York Times story about an individual who claims to have reported Jeffrey Epstein to the FBI in the late 1990s. The email is forwarded for situational awareness within the FBI.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The email references a New York Times story about a claim that he was reported to the FBI in the late 1990s.

events.title: Claim of reporting Epstein to FBI
events.description: An individual (not named in this excerpt) claims to have reported Jeffrey Epstein to the FBI in the late 1990s.

events.title: New York Times story publication
events.description: The New York Times publishes a story about the claim that Epstein was reported to the FBI in the late 1990s.

keyFacts: An email from August 26, 2019, forwards information about a New York Times story.
The story involves a claim that Jeffrey Epstein was reported to the FBI in the late 1990s.
The email sender had previously reported the possibility of this story and the claim.
The email is forwarded 'FYSA' (For Your Situational Awareness), indicating internal FBI communication.
The document is an internal FBI email referencing media coverage of a historical claim about Epstein.
